form_fields.label: Plausible Secret Key Base
form_fields.hint: Configures the secret used for sessions in the dashboard, doesn't have any defaults and needs to be provided in the ENV vars

form_fields.label: Plausible TOTP Vault Key
form_fields.hint: Configures the secret used for encrypting TOTP secrets at rest using AES256-GCM, doesn't have any defaults and needs to be provided in the ENV vars

form_fields.label: Disable Registration
form_fields.hint: Restricts registration of new users. Possible values are true (full restriction), false (no restriction), and invite_only (only the invited users can register).

form_fields.label: Enable Email Verification
form_fields.hint: When enabled, new users need to verify their email addressby following a link delivered to their mailbox. Please configure your server for SMTP to receive this email.

form_fields.label: Google Client ID
form_fields.hint: The Client ID from the Google API Console for your project. Not set by default.

form_fields.label: Google Client Secret
form_fields.hint: The Client Secret from the Google API Console for your project. Not set by default.

form_fields.label: MaxMind License Key
form_fields.hint: If set, this ENV variable takes precedence over IP_GEOLOCATION_DB and makes Plausible download (and keep up to date) a free MaxMind GeoLite2 MMDB of the selected edition

form_fields.label: MaxMind Edition
form_fields.hint: MaxMind database edition to use (only if MAXMIND_LICENSE_KEY is set)

form_fields.label: Mail Provider
form_fields.hint: The mail provider to use for sending emails. The default is the built-in SMTP adapter.

form_fields.label: From Email
form_fields.hint: The email id to use for as from address of all communications from Plausible.

form_fields.label: From Email Name
form_fields.hint: The display name for the sender (from).

form_fields.label: SMTP Host
form_fields.hint: The host address of your SMTP relay.

form_fields.label: SMTP Host Port
form_fields.hint: The port of your SMTP relay.

form_fields.label: SMTP User Name
form_fields.hint: The username/email in case SMTP auth is required on your SMTP relay.

form_fields.label: SMTP User Password
form_fields.hint: The username/email in case SMTP auth is required on your SMTP relay.

form_fields.label: SMTP Host SSL Enabled
form_fields.hint: Configures whether SMTPS (SMTP over SSL) is enabled for SMTP connection, e.g. when you use port 465.

form_fields.label: SMTP Retries
form_fields.hint: Number of retries to make until mailer gives up.

form_fields.label: Postmark API Key
form_fields.hint: You also have to set the MAILER_EMAIL variable which needs to be configured in PostmarkApps sender signatures.

form_fields.label: MailGun BASE URI
form_fields.hint: Mailgun makes a difference in the API base URL between sender domains from within the EU and outside. By default, the base URL is set to https://api.mailgun.net/v3. To override this you can pass https://api.eu.mailgun.net/v3 if you are using an EU domain.
